content:
I am a PhD candidate in the Department of Sociology at Cornell University. My research focuses on social hierarchies, how individuals perceive their legitimacy, and how they affect social cohesion. I am also broadly interested in the use of computational methods to study interesting sociological questions (e.g. online experiments, machine learning, natural language processing).
You can download my CV here.

title: Mario D. Molina
